title: IS INTING BANNABLE?
body: so tell me, why is league so full of cun.ts? ok let me rephrase that: why do i get people who int, intentionally feed, troll, lose game on purpose EVERY FU.CKING GAME!?!!?!??!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!??!?!?!?!?!?!? im sick and tired of this bullshit do these people not get banned? they literally admit to inting half the time and i never get a response saying they got punished.

replies.body: It is, but the automated system does a terrible  job at detecting it.
It's not that it's a terrible job, but unless they openly admit to it, it's a much harder thing to detect because doing poorly is not intentionally feeding.  Intentionally being the keyword.
Add to it all the people false reporting people that are just doing badly as "inting", and it becomes very hard to train a system for that

> people who int, intentionally feed

That's the same thing, and part of the problem are people who use "int" in the wrong context. It devalues actual intentional feeding, and makes it hard to distinguish between the two. Frustrated players might think "don't say that I'm inting when I just have a bad game or I will show you what inting means".

In many cases, people just snap and stop caring for the rest of the game, and want to take revenge at their team mates; flamers are often the reason for this. While I don't think that getting flamed justifies feeding at all, and everyone should just mute and report flamers, I think that flamers are much worse than feeders and I can sympathize more with feeders than flamers (but I don't think it is ok to do either!). Most people who feed intentionally (which already happens very rarely) just don't want to take the harassment anymore.

Looking at your post, I get the impression that you might (possibly) be partly responsible for people feeding in your game.

if by inting you mean feeding than sure...

inting isn't a thing, not a reportable thing anyway.
maybe if you didn't tilt them so often you wouldn't get them to int so consistently

I looked at the kill map, your team took out one tower, the Lucian died inside the inhibitor turrets three times,  Brand died to the nexus turrets once.

So I believe you that these 2 players were trolling and yes did INT.

Inting is, however most of what people think is inting is just someone having a bad game or being trash at league. Being bad is not punishable until it crosses a line into being _very_ bad, all the time.
It's pretty hard for a report system to detect between a imaqtpie "unlucky game" and an int...
this belongs in player behavior ma boi

It is probably because you consider anybody who feeds "inting" and not buying mobi boots and tears and running it up mid as the only inting.

Stop using a word you don't know the definition of. Being bad isnt reportable or your account would of gotten banned long ago

it is a banreason yes. but sadly riot has no system that deals with it.
and from what i can tell... riot does not give a fuck either/dont work on a system
